overview: Have you ever dreamed of being buried in a pile of naked bodies with one hot slut sitting on your face, another screwing your stick shift, while you play digital darts with the orifices of one or two other playmates? Why can't fantasy be reality? For sultry Nikki Randall reality can be all this, but it's fantasy that's causing her problems. Nikki Randall is just the kind of slut you dream about. She's got an itch this evening and she's going to a party to get it scratched. But she's the first to arrive, or is she? Things are not quite as they seem. Dildoes and demons appear out of the dark. But the orgy? Where is it? Wait, here's party animal, hot blond newcomer, Tiffany Jordan, popping up to take Nikki on a journey through orgyville. But do they ever really get there?Orgy after orgy, scene after scene, Hot Slut Orgies delivers hot poundi...
title: Hot Slut Orgies
